entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
